description: abstract image of a figure with rectangular head, bat-like ears, with mouth open and hands held up in front of chest; loose orange glasses near eyes; multicolored shirt and bright, multicolored hands and forearms; pencil writing across text with stray lines and marks; " A Dog Boy" scrawled across top

inscription: Titled along top, in pencil: A Dog Boy
medium: Pigment, graphite, and pastel on paper
signed: Signed and dated in black grease pencil: Bartow / \'01
title: A Dog Boy
